name: Amplified Tubing Volumizing and Lengthening Mascara
about: What it is:.What it does:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Water, Ammonium Acrylates Copolymer, Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Glyceryl Stearate, Beeswax/Cera Alba, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera, Styrene/Acrylates Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Stearic Acid, Polysorbate 80, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Mica, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Laureth-21, Trisodium EDTA, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Nitrate, Disodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Phosphate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-To apply, use Blinc Mascara Amplifed on clean and dry lashes...-Brush on until you have achieved the desired degree of lash separation, volume, and length...-You can build on additional volume by applying as many coats as you wish...-For removal, neither water or pressure alone will remove Blinc Mascara Amplifed. Only the combination of lots of warm water and gentle pressure from your fingertips, a washcloth, or water pressure (i.e. shower) will slide the tiny tubes off your lashes effortlessly...-Upon removal, you will actually see tiny tubes in your hand!

reviews.review_title: A must for those with sensitive eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite mascara for sensitive eyes. I was actually recommended this brand by my eye doctor.   I have been using it for years and continue to repurchase. I can tell the difference with my eyes when I use other mascaras.

reviews.review_title: Lashes stuck together when you apply more coats
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you apply 1 coat for a natural look itâ€™s fine but if you want more volume , it makes your lashes look stuck together when you apply more coats . Kat von D tubing and caliray tubing mascara are much better .
